Class oracle.html.TableCell

Class oracle.html.TableCell 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.TableCell
public class TableCell
extends Item
implements IHAlign, IVAlign
TableCell is an abstract base class for all TableCells

Instructions:

You cannot directly instantiate a TableCell object. You usually use a TableCell object either by instantiating a TableHeaderCell object or a TableDataCell object.

See Also:
TableHeaderCell, TableRowCell, TableDataCell

TableCell()

halign()
Returns the Horizontal Alignment Attribute for this cell
setHAlign(int)
Sets the Horizontal Alignment Attribute for this cell
setVAlign(int)
Sets the Vertical Alignment Attribute for this cell
valign()
Returns the Vertical Alignment Attribute for this cell

TableCell 
  public TableCell()

valign 
  public int valign()
Returns the Vertical Alignment Attribute for this cell
halign 
  public int halign()
Returns the Horizontal Alignment Attribute for this cell
setVAlign 
  public void setVAlign(int valign)
Sets the Vertical Alignment Attribute for this cell
setHAlign 
  public void setHAlign(int halign)
Sets the Horizontal Alignment Attribute for this cell
